m=(a+b)/2;
err = 2 - m

err =

plot(m)
plot(m,'*')
plot(err,'*r')
plot(log(abs(err)),'r*')
polyfit(1:length(err),log(abs(err)),1)

ans =

  -0.693147180559945   0.000000000000000

coeffs=polyfit(1:length(err),log(abs(err)),1)

coeffs =

  -0.693147180559945   0.000000000000000

m=coeffs(1); B=coeffs(2)

B =

     4.232268566237738e-16

k=1:length(err);
plot(k,log(abs(err)),'r*',k,m*k+B,'g')
plot(k,log(abs(err)),'r*',k,m*k+B,'b')
